name: Lucjan
one: Okay what the hell is going on! What happend to those suckers?!
My shadow... I can talk with my shadow
Well, since we have that sorted out I can introduce myself.
I am your shadow, the one that followed you from the day of your birth.
We, shadows, are concious beings, existing in your world.
But You cannot communicate with us, as we don't have the free will.
But when strong shadow magic is released, our worlds are able to connect with each other only for a split second.
In that moment shadows can pass through and take form in Your world.
That's what happened and now I am here.
But, why are You still here, why are We even alive?
The mysterious mineral you just mined is able to absorb high ammount of strong shadow power and store it indefinetly.
Your friend, was lucky enough to stand close to You
Mikut please stop mumbling and help me! If we help them fast enough, we'll be able to make it!
Tell him it won't do anything.
Lucjan, my shadow tells me they're done.
Screw your stupid ass shadow, I will save them!
Now you need to leave this place quickly and then You need to help me...
With what can I help a shadow?!
You must go to the Shadow Gate as soon as possible
What the hell are You talking about, Shadow Gate is just a conspiracy theory!
Mikut you freaking lunatic, stop mubling and help me!
You couldn't be more wrong. It exist, and all these bad things are beacuse of this.
And the biggest industrialists all know about this. That's how they gain power so fast
How in the world am I supposed to find it, huh?!
And how do you imagine me fighing corporations that own everything, HUH?!
First you need to meet the person who has the knowledge
